content.question: Which of the following is played?

choices.label:
Three measures of music in bass clef. The key signature is D minor and the time signature is three-four.
-	Measure 1 is quarter note D3, dotted quarter D4, and eighth note C4. 
-	Measure 2 is dotted eighth B-flat 3, sixteenth A3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth F3, dotted eighth E3, and sixteenth C-sharp 3. 
-	Measure 3 is quarter notes D3, A2, and D2.

Three measures of music in bass clef. The key signature is D minor and the time signature is three-four.
-	Measure 1 is dotted quarter note D3, eighth D4, and quarter C4. 
-	Measure 2 is dotted eighth B-flat 3, sixteenth A3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth F3, dotted eighth E3, and sixteenth C-sharp 3. 
-	Measure 3 is quarter notes D3, A2, and D2.

Three measures of music in bass clef. The key signature is D minor and the time signature is three-four.
-	Measure 1 is quarter note D3, dotted quarter D4, and eighth note C4. 
-	Measure 2 is eighth note B-flat 3, quarter A3, quarter G3, and sixteenth notes E3 and C-sharp 3.
-	Measure 3 is quarter notes D3, A2, and D2.

Three measures of music in bass clef. The key signature is D minor and the time signature is three-four.
-	Measure 1 is dotted quarter note D3, eighth D4, and quarter C4.
-	Measure 2 is eighth note B-flat 3, sixteenth notes A3 and G3, quarter note F3, and eighth notes E3 and C-sharp 3.
-	Measure 3 is quarter notes D3, A2, and D2.

content.answer:
Three measures of music in bass clef. The key signature is D minor and the time signature is three-four.
-	Measure 1 is dotted quarter note D3, eighth D4, and quarter C4. 
-	Measure 2 is dotted eighth B-flat 3, sixteenth A3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth F3, dotted eighth E3, and sixteenth C-sharp 3. 
-	Measure 3 is quarter notes D3, A2, and D2.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
